data.title: Fujitsu Partner Day 2024
data.text:
üìÖ This Tuesday (11.06) sees the start of Fujitsu Partner Day 2024. This year's edition will be held on 11 June at Villa Foksal in Warsaw. The meeting will bring together business representatives, industry experts and Fujitsu technology partners.

üíπ Participants will have the opportunity to discover the latest technologies that are an integral part of modern business and everyday life. The event programme includes inspiring presentations, interactive sessions and numerous opportunities for networking and sharing experiences.

ü§ñ At Fujitsu Partner Day 2024, we will learn more about key innovations for sustainable transformation, the benefits of the new Cyberbonus programme, among others. Advanced Data Centre solutions, Fujitsu's support for data security in the private cloud and the opportunities that AI technology (including Fujitsu Private GPT) offers in optimising business processes will also be presented.

üèÜ The event will also be an opportunity to honour Fujitsu Partners for their outstanding achievements.

üé§The stage will feature:

Dariusz Kwieci≈Ñski, Marcin Gwara, Wojtek Wr√≥bel, Maria Kosi≈Ñska-≈Åaszczyk, Sebastian Perczy≈Ñski, Artur Duszczyk, Paluszy≈Ñski Wies≈Çaw, Piotr Mieczkowski

Technology partners: Microsoft, SUSE Polska, AMD

Media and content patrons: IT RESELLER,CRN Polska, Polska Izba Informatyki i Telekomunikacji, Fundacja Digital Poland

üîó We encourage you to register.
